TopicTitle: Planetbase - space colony sim goes in free beta.

Articles.Content: Planet base is realistic sim colony set in not so distant future. Your goal is to establish self sustaining base and increase it's population starting with initial team of 7 colonist and 2 bots with end goal of reaching over 300 colonist. Currently there are 3 planets to play on each with different environment and and challenges. Free beta access can be requested here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/updates/472081504/1442314027 and the game is supposed to come out of beta in mid October.
